mapper.select: select id, tokenid, utime, yesterday, today, total from nprox.swarm_token_total where id = #{id}
select id, tokenid, utime, yesterday, today, total from nprox.swarm_token_total limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into nprox.swarm_token_total(tokenid, utime, yesterday, today, total) values (#{tokenid}, #{utime}, #{yesterday}, #{today}, #{total})

insert into nprox.swarm_token_total(tokenid, utime, yesterday, today, total) values
(#{entity.tokenid}, #{entity.utime}, #{entity.yesterday}, #{entity.today}, #{entity.total})

insert into nprox.swarm_token_total(tokenid, utime, yesterday, today, total) values
(#{entity.tokenid}, #{entity.utime}, #{entity.yesterday}, #{entity.today}, #{entity.total})
on duplicate key update tokenid = values(tokenid) , utime = values(utime) , yesterday = values(yesterday) , today = values(today) , total = values(total)
mapper.update:
update nprox.swarm_token_total
tokenid = #{tokenid},
utime = #{utime},
yesterday = #{yesterday},
today = #{today},
total = #{total},
where id = #{id}
